DEMO_130_MSG_010:
́Hmmm... Hmmm... Ahh... yes, yes... I see now... 
So that's what they were using this device for...
DEMO_130_MSG_100:
́If you use this machine correctly, you'll be able to make one heck of a Monster Team.
ā
DEMO_130_MSG_030:
́This is an amazing find, ȁ! This machine here is 
gonna help you out, a whole heck of a lot!
DEMO_130_MSG_110:
́I was just about ready to boot this thing back up. 
I'm gonna go ahead and finish up doin' that now.
DEMO_130_MSG_040: ́It looks to be some kind o' Monster Fusion machine, built by the Monster Masters that used to live here.
DEMO_130_MSG_120: ́Before that though, why don't you go on over an' check-in with His Highness to make sure he's okay with us doin' that.
DEMO_130_MSG_050: ́I bet ya already knew that, eh? Probably had a quick peek with your Reactor, eh!?
DEMO_130_MSG_060: ́Oh, man... well that's a bummer... I kinda wanted it to be a surprise, but what're ya gonna do...
DEMO_130_MSG_080:
́This here machine... well, it lets you take two or more monsters and fuse 'em together!
ā
DEMO_130_MSG_090:
́Pretty wild stuff, eh? Fusin' monsters together to make
entirely new ones...
